page.title: 13MOULTON PRIMARY SC. VISITS
page.content: The schools nowadays go on trips maybe about the project the classes are doing. Trips that have been carried out by the sdchool are the cattle Market,Daily Bread Centre and Stoke Bruerne. Everdon for example cost about 20.00 pounds for three days and three nights and on that the classes went to the local church,a field trip to see the hounds. The Cattle Market was only a day trip and cost 2.00 pounds per child and that was really only for the coach as to get into the Cattle Market addmission is free. On this trip we looked at the sheep being clipped by men and sold by an auctioners standing outside on a platform above five sheep. The auctioners were shouting out numbers, inside a building that was set out like a circus ring.
